yaml.title: Technical Competency Matrix
yaml.subtitle: Cloud Architecture | Data Engineering | AI Research

markdown.markdown:
:::{.column-page} I am a Master's graduate in AI & Machine Learning with a focus on **productionizing AI systems**. This portfolio demonstrates my competency in **Cloud Architecture** (AWS/GCP), **Data Pipelines**, and **Deep Learning Research**, validated by industry certifications and rigorous engineering projects. ::: --- ## 1. Cloud & MLOps (AWS/GCP) {#cloud} :::{.grid} :::{.g-col-4} ### Certifications ![](images/Generative AI Architect - Training Badge.png){width=100} **GenAI Architect**
![](images/Generative AI Practitioner - Training Badge.png){width=100} **GenAI Practitioner**
![](images/Cloud Foundations - Training Badge.png){width=100} **Cloud Foundations**
![](images/Google Cloud Fundamentals Core Infrastructure.png){width=100} **Google Core Infra** ::: :::{.g-col-8} ### Competency Evidence To demonstrate these skills, I built a **Serverless Inspection Pipeline** and a **Carbon-Aware Scheduler**. #### **A. Serverless AI Pipeline (Edge-to-Cloud)** *Objective: Sub-100ms defect detection for manufacturing.* ![](images/Serverless AI Pipeline for Quality Inspection description/diagram-export-4-26-2025-12_59_07-PM.png){width=100%} * **Tech Stack:** AWS Greengrass, Lambda, IoT Core, PyTorch. * **Key Result:** Achieved <100ms latency using local edge inference. * [**View Source on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/Serverless-AI-Pipeline-for-High-Throughput-Quality-Inspection-on-AWS){.btn .btn-primary role="button"} #### **B. Carbon-Aware Agentic Scheduler** *Objective: Reducing AI training carbon footprint by 13.4%.* ```{mermaid} %%| label: fig-carbon %%| fig-cap: "Multi-Agent Workflow" flowchart LR Watcher[Watcher Agent] -->|Polls Grid API| History[(Grid History)] History -->|Carbon Forecast| Scheduler[Scheduler Agent] Scheduler -->|Decision| Action{Run or Defer?} Action -- High Carbon --> Defer((Defer Job)) Action -- Low Carbon --> Run((Run Now)) ``` * **Architecture:** A multi-agent system using **LangGraph** to shift workloads to low-carbon time windows. * **Key Result:** 13.4% reduction in CO2 emissions during "Golden Week" simulation. * [**View Source on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/carbon-aware-scheduler){.btn .btn-primary role="button"} ::: ::: --- ## 2. Data Engineering (Pipelines) {#data} :::{.grid} :::{.g-col-4} ### Certifications ![](images/Build a Data Warehouse with BigQuery Skill Badge.png){width=100} **BigQuery Data Warehouse** ::: :::{.g-col-8} ### Competency Evidence I engineered the **EuroAgri Pipeline**, a scalable system harmonizing heterogeneous geospatial data. #### **EuroAgri Pipeline** *Objective: Generate climate-adaptive agronomic insights from raw soil/weather data.* ![](images/EuroAgri Pipeline/schema_metagraph.png){width=100%} * **Innovation:** Developed a transparent heuristic engine to impute missing Nitrogen/Phosphorus data. * **Output:** Structured Parquet datasets and a Neo4j Knowledge Graph. * [**View Source on GitHub**](https://github.com/Najo1on1/euroagri-pipeline){.btn .btn-success role="button"} ::: ::: --- ## 3. AI Research (Deep Learning) {#ai} :::{.grid} :::{.g-col-4} ### Certifications ![](images/Machine Learning - Training Badge.png){width=100} **AWS Machine Learning** ![](images/Prompt Design in Vertex AI Skill Badge.png){width=100} **Vertex AI Prompt Design** ::: :::{.g-col-8} ### Competency Evidence My Master's dissertation focused on **calibrated uncertainty quantification** for the Irish Power System. #### **Net-Load Forecasting with MC-Dropout** * **Methodology:** Developed a **MC-Dropout LSTM** network to predict net-load volatility. * **Anomaly Detection:** Implemented Residual-Based detection using **Deep SVDD**. * **Key Artifacts:** * *Uncertainty Plots:* Visualized 80% and 95% confidence intervals. * *Statistical Validation:* Confirmed superiority over ARIMA-GARCH using Diebold-Mariano tests. [**Download Dissertation Overview (PDF)**](files/Dissertation 21189676 Muwanguzi Jonathan.pdf){.btn .btn-info role="button"} ::: :::

:::{.column-page} # Executive Summary I am a Master's graduate in AI & Machine Learning with a focus on **productionizing AI systems**. This portfolio demonstrates my competency in **Cloud Architecture** (AWS/GCP), **Data Pipelines**, and **Deep Learning Research**, validated by industry certifications and rigorous engineering projects. ::: --- ## 1.
